attacks.name: Stretch Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and this attack does 10 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Skedaddle
attacks.effect: Return Aipom and all basic Energy cards attached to it to your hand. If you have no Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing.
